settings.title: What is a tincture?
settings.text: Tinctures are made from plant matter/mushrooms soaked in water and alcohol to extract the beneficial constituents in liquid form. Other extraction methods use apple cider vinegar or vegetable glycerine. All extract different compounds and nutrients necessary for the formula's targeted function.

settings.title: How do you take tinctures?
settings.text:
This all depends on the formula but as a general rule...

  • Shake Well Before Using.
  • Take one squeeze straight by mouth or add to water, tea, or juice.
  • Increase dose as needed. 
  • Best taken in between meals.
  • Keep out of reach of children. 
  • Store away in a cool dry environment.
  • Each bottle is approximately a 30 day supply.

Please see each individual product for exact details.

settings.title: Are the product drug test safe?
settings.text: Yes, all of our products are 100% drug test safe; there are no ingredients in any of our formulas that would cause you to fail a drug test.

settings.title: How long until you notice results?
settings.text:
With regular use, a healthy individual often notices a subtle change after the first week, confirms the change at 2 weeks, and is reaching maximum potential by 3 weeks.


It’s very important to note that everyone’s a unique individual with a body and metabolism that responds differently. Some people may notice a difference within days while others may take weeks. Remember that consistency is key to achieving results.

settings.title: Do you use dual extraction methods?
settings.text: Yes, on all of the mushroom products we use dual extraction for the hot water polysaccharides and beta-glucans along with ethanol to extract the terpenes, triterpenoids, inositols, ergosterols, and flavonoids.

settings.title: Are Plantsbasically products gluten-free?
settings.text: Yes, All of our elixirs currently use organic cane alcohol. The products are safe to take if you have a gluten allergy. This makes our product line 100% gluten-free!

settings.title: Can you take PlantsBasically products daily?
settings.text: Yes, the whole product line uses tonic herbs, medicinal mushrooms, and superfoods that are safe for the vast majority to take daily.

settings.title: Are tinctures safe for pregnant women and children?
settings.text: There is currently not enough research available to confirm safe during pregnancy or for young adults. We suggest always checking with your health care professional before taking any dietary supplement.

settings.title: How long does it take to get my product?
settings.text:
Order processing time is 24-hours incase of cancelations.

Once orders ship the average delivery time is 2-5 day shipping. This is a estimate which can be shorter or longer based on your location.

We only offer USPS first class and priority mail. Sorry, no next day expedited shipping at this time.

100% Money back guarantee if you aren't satisfied with your purchase within 30 days let us know and will issue you a full refund.

Please reach out to Info@plantsbasically.com for any further questions or assistance.

settings.title: What is your return/refund policy?
settings.text: We accept returns on unopened products within 30 days of purchase. We apologize in advance, but we do not accept returns on opened products or products past the 30 day purchase period. However, if you have used the product entirely and not satisfied with your results, we can issue a store credit. Please reach out to Info@plantsbasically.com

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: We do ship internationally. We have shipped packages to a number of different countries using USPS. The international option at checkout will automatically calculate your shipping cost.

settings.title: How do I become a part of the affiliate program?
Wholesale Accounts?
settings.text: If you are a business looking to open a wholesale account with us please contact Info@plantbasically.com with any questions regarding wholesale information.
